titleStmt.title: Ourography or Speculations on the excrements of urine with the distinctions, causes, colours, and contents thereof: and other symptomes observed in nature. Also, a philosophicall discourse of the colours of urine, with the art of mixing them, according to quantity, number, and weight. By Henry Hamand.
titleStmt.author: Hamand, Henry.

titleStmt.title: Ourography or Speculations on the excrements of urine with the distinctions, causes, colours, and contents thereof: and other symptomes observed in nature. Also, a philosophicall discourse of the colours of urine, with the art of mixing them, according to quantity, number, and weight. By Henry Hamand.
titleStmt.author: Hamand, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold at the Marygold, in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Includes index and four final advertisement leaves.
